about_the_game: Purchasing this is a great way to show your support for the development of Spawn Kings. This game is being solo developed and is getting updated at least once a week for as long as possible. The goal is to create a free to play game for everyone to be able to enjoy without having pay to win options ruin the fun of a turn based monster collector. All donations are greatly appreciated and will help motivate and potentially allow more time to be spent on speeding up the progression of Spawn Kings :)
